abstract: Power.com, a site that lets users sign in to several social networks from one place, is mounting a counter-suit against Facebook, alleging that its frenemy is attempting to monopolize the social networking market.
snippet: Power.com, a site that lets users sign in to several social networks from one place, is mounting a counter-suit against Facebook, alleging that its frenemy is attempting to monopolize the social networking market.
lead_paragraph: From Claire Cain Miller at Bits:
